full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

All good now. Thank you!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Sure, it should be working fine now. if it doesn't can you send what phone you are using so we could test it? Thanks!
https://acoufelt.com.au/commercial/office-acoustic-solutions/
Logged 15mins to Harvest

Hi Joel,

Thanks for updating the page!

Just noticed that the description of the carousel overlaps with the CTA below. Can you add padding so there's enough clear space? Not sure if it hasn't updated yet on my end but there's still a horizontal bar that appears.



Thanks again!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



acoufelt.com
note
@rica (Time: 15mins)

Hi Criselda,

I hope you had a great weekend

We have updated the page, it should be showing correctly now.
  • Slider set 2 on tablet and set to 1 on mobile
  • Projects should be showing all items on the field
  • Fixed the horizontal bar.
https://acoufelt.com.au/commercial/office-acoustic-solutions/

Hi Joel, Here are some comments on the page:
  • Can you make the slider optimized for mobile as it looks mixed up. Maybe we can just have one post to display at a time.
  • Why is it that some of the projects that I added don't appear on the page
  • Can you also adjust the page so it fits the mobile screen properly? Though the entire content is visible without needing to swipe it sideways, it's a bit disruptive when you scroll through the page
Let me know if you have questions. Thank you! Warm regards, Criselda Romero Digital Marketing Manager acoufelt.com
Logged 15mins to Harvest
@rica (Time: 15mins)

Hi Criselda,

Sure, we have updated the slider arrows.

Hi Joel,

Thanks for that!

Carousel is looking good.

Just one comment. Can we change the shape behind the arrow to a circle like below



Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda.

Sure, confirming we have updated the page.
https://acoufelt.com.au/commercial/office-acoustic-solutions/

Hi Joel,

Thanks for updating the page!

Just a few comments. Noticed that the images in the carousel below look distorted.



Can we have the carousel to display like the ones in the Projects page? See screenshot below.

Please ensure the photos are displayed correctly and instead of grabbing the first paragraph to appear at the bottom of each image, we'll just have the short description and 'Read More' link but don't include the links to the featured products.



Let me know if you have questions.

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager

Confirming we have updated the page. The section will only show up when the field "Projects" is filled up.
https://acoufelt.com.au/commercial/office-acoustic-solutions/

Hi Joel,

Can we do this only for this page for now: Office Acoustic Solutions https://acoufelt.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=12248&action=edit



I've added the projects to be featured however when I updated it, it doesn't display as carousel. Can we have this list in a carousel and show 3 posts at a time?

Thank you

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager

Hi Criselda,

We are looking into this, it seems that this was created under a "Pages" > "Commercial" > (Office, Call Centre ...). We have created the fields and these fields are only available for Commercial children pages.

We just want to confirm what list you would like to show, if its the "projects post type" or the "snap shot post type"?
